basics.name: Howard Roark
basics.label: Freelance Web Developer
basics.summary: I am an experienced web developer with over 10 years experience.  I have worked on projects of all different sizes for companies large and small.  I really enjoy learning from new people and take pride in my work.

work.summary: I understand the web "stack" from top to bottom and can use that knowledge to adapt to any problem.  I am comfortable working with old and new systems and always strive to make improvements wherever I can.  I am most comfortable in an agile setup and am able to prototype ideas quickly so that decisions can be made around them.

volunteer.summary: Offered mentorship through a coding coop program.
